originalText.text: Dr Boester has been my doc for 12 years. She’s fantastic and I highly recommend her. I travel from NJ to see her now after moving from Queens. I’ll always make the trip for a great doc like her!

text.text: Dr Boester has been my doc for 12 years. She’s fantastic and I highly recommend her. I travel from NJ to see her now after moving from Queens. I’ll always make the trip for a great doc like her!

originalText.text: Dr. Boester has been my OBGYN for both of my pregnancies. She is very calm, cool and collected which my very anxious self needed during a pandemic pregnancy and a post-pandemic pregnancy. She did not get to deliver my babies but she was kind and patient at all my visits!

text.text: Dr. Boester has been my OBGYN for both of my pregnancies. She is very calm, cool and collected which my very anxious self needed during a pandemic pregnancy and a post-pandemic pregnancy. She did not get to deliver my babies but she was kind and patient at all my visits!

originalText.text: In my opinion, Dr. Boester is an excellent physician. She listens carefully and offers excellent advice.

text.text: In my opinion, Dr. Boester is an excellent physician. She listens carefully and offers excellent advice.

originalText.text: Dr. Boester and her team are absolutely wonderful. The environment in office is professional and fun. Dr. Boester is straight and to the point when explaining next steps/what to expect, but by no means do I ever feel rushed. She is also very patient and understanding with my MANY questions. Very fortunate to have her and her staff as part of pregnancy journey.

text.text: Dr. Boester and her team are absolutely wonderful. The environment in office is professional and fun. Dr. Boester is straight and to the point when explaining next steps/what to expect, but by no means do I ever feel rushed. She is also very patient and understanding with my MANY questions. Very fortunate to have her and her staff as part of pregnancy journey.

originalText.text: Dr. Boester was excellent, very kind, had great bedside manner and made my first prenatal appointment so fun and easy. She alleviated all of my concerns and answered all questions I had being that this is my first pregnancy. My blood work was done rapidly and it was so nice to see all results sooner than expected. It was great that she reaches out to you personally to review this information and plan for next steps.  The facility is professional, clean, and I am looking forward to continuing my prenatal care with Weil Cornell.
